trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable option displayed on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et valgbar alternativ vises på en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Although ToolStripMenuItem replaces and adds functionality to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> control of previous versions, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Selv om ToolStripMenuItem erstatter og legger til funksjoner til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> kontroll over tidligere versjoner <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> er beholdt for bakoverkompatibilitet og fremtidig bruk hvis du velger.

trans-unit.source: ToolStripMenuItem is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> that works with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> to handle the special highlighting, layout, and column arrangement for menus.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripMenuItem er en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>som fungerer med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>til å håndtere den spesielle utheving, oppsett og kolonne plasseringen for menyer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: In order for a ToolStripMenuItem to be displayed, you must add it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: At en ToolStripMenuItem som skal vises, må du legge den til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolStripMenuItem class provides properties that enable you to configure the appearance and functionality of a menu item.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ToolStripMenuItem inneholder egenskaper som gjør det mulig å konfigurere utseendet og funksjonaliteten til et menyelement.

trans-unit.source: To display a check mark next to a menu item, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise merket av for et menyelement, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this feature to identify a menu item that is selected in a list of mutually exclusive menu items.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne funksjonen til å identifisere et menyelement som er valgt i en liste over utelukker menyelementer.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a set of menu items for setting the color of text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked%2A> property to identify which color is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har et sett med menyelementer for å angi fargen på teksten i for eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kontrollere ved å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked%2A>til å identifisere hvilke farge for øyeblikket er valgt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.ShortcutKeys%2A> property to define a keyboard combination that can be pressed to select the menu item.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.ShortcutKeys%2A>til å angi en tastatur kombinasjon som kan trykkes velge menyalternativet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.ShortcutKeys%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> class that displays the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> klasse som viser angitt <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripMenuItem constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> that displays an image in the margin alongside the text.
trans-unit.target: Bruk konstruktøren ToolStripMenuItem til å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>som viser et bilde i margen ved siden av tekst.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> skal vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> class that displays the specified text.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> klassen som viser den angitte teksten.

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripMenuItem constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Bruk konstruktøren ToolStripMenuItem til å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>med det angitte navnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the menu item.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises for menyelementet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> class that displays the specified text and image.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> klasse som viser angitt tekst og bilde.

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripMenuItem constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> with the specified name and image.
trans-unit.target: Bruk konstruktøren ToolStripMenuItem til å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>med angitt navn- og bildefiler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the menu item.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises for menyelementet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> skal vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> class that displays the specified text and image and that does the specified action when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> klassen som viser angitte tekst og bilde, og som har den angitte handlingen når den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> klikkes.

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripMenuItem to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> that displays both text and an image and that does the specified action when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av ToolStripMenuItem til å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>som viser både tekst og et bilde, og som har den angitte handlingen når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>klikkes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the menu item.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises for menyelementet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> skal vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandling opphøyer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> -hendelse når kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> class that displays the specified text and image and that contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> klassen som viser angitte tekst og bilde, og som inneholder den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> samling.

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripMenuItem constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> that displays text and an image and that contains the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk konstruktøren ToolStripMenuItem til å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>som viser tekst og et bilde, og som inneholder den angitte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the menu item.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises for menyelementet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> skal vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The menu items to display when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Menyelementer skal vises når kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> class with the specified name that displays the specified text and image that does the specified action when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> klassen med det angitte navnet som viser angitt tekst og som har den angitte handlingen når den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the menu item.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises for menyelementet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> skal vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandling opphøyer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> -hendelse når kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The name of the menu item.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på menyelementet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> class that displays the specified text and image, does the specified action when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> is clicked, and displays the specified shortcut keys.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> klasse som viser angitt tekst og bilde, har den angitte handlingen når den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> klikkes og viser de angitte hurtigtastene.

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripMenuItem constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> that displays text and an image, performs the specified action when clicked, and has the specified shortcut key.
trans-unit.target: Bruk konstruktøren ToolStripMenuItem til å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>som viser tekst og et bilde som utfører handlingen angitt når du klikker og har angitte hurtigtasten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the menu item.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises for menyelementet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> skal vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandling opphøyer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> -hendelse når kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> that represents the shortcut key for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> som representerer hurtigtasten for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> kontrolleres.

trans-unit.source: The Checked property returns `false` if and only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> is unchecked.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer avmerkede `false` Hvis og bare hvis det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>er merket.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, when an item is checked or indeterminate, the corresponding icon may be resized.
trans-unit.target: Starter med .NET Framework 4.5.2, når et element er merket av eller ubestemt, kan tilsvarende ikonet endres.

trans-unit.source: Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: Endre størrelse på bestemmes ppt systeminnstillingen når app.config-filen inneholder følgende oppføring:``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> is checked or is in an indeterminate state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> er merket, eller er i en ubestemt tilstand; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> should automatically appear checked and unchecked when clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> skal vises automatisk avmerkede og ukontrollert når du klikker.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> should automatically appear checked when clicked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> skal vises automatisk avmerkede når klikket; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> is in the checked, unchecked, or indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> er i tilstanden avmerkede ukontrollert eller ubestemt.

trans-unit.source: Use the CheckState property to control or determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> is initially checked, unchecked, or in an indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen CheckState styre eller fastslå om en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>sjekkes, ukontrollert, eller i en ubestemt tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, if the CheckState property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, the corresponding icon may be resized.
trans-unit.target: Start med .NET Framework 4.5.2, hvis CheckState-egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, tilsvarende ikonet kan endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: Endre størrelse på bestemmes ppt systeminnstillingen når app.config-filen inneholder følgende oppføring:``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unchecked" name="Unchecked" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unchecked" name="Unchecked" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CheckState property is not set to one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CheckState er ikke satt til en av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckState*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckState*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckState*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt tilgjengelighet-objekt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a generic <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> for which events can be defined.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en generisk <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> for hendelser som kan angis.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDefaultDropDown method is automatically called if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property finds no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateDefaultDropDown kalles automatisk hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>egenskapen finner ingen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>tilknyttet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: A generic <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> for which can be defined.
trans-unit.target: En generell <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> som kan defineres.

trans-unit.source: Gets the spacing between the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> and an adjacent item.
trans-unit.target: Henter avstanden mellom den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> og et tilstøtende element.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> value representing the spacing.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> verdien som representerer avstanden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den interne mellomrommet innenfor den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> value representing the spacing.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> verdien som representerer avstanden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardstørrelsen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Override DefaultSize in derived classes to configure a default size for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre DefaultSize i avledede klasser til å konfigurere en standardstørrelse for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: This is more efficient than setting the size in the control's constructor.
trans-unit.target: Dette er mer effektivt enn innstillingen størrelsen i kontrollens konstruktør.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>, measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>, målt i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The default is 100 pixels horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Standard er vannrett 100 piksler.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>referanser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frigi ressurser både administrerte og uforvaltede; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> appears on a multiple document interface (MDI) window list.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> vises på en flere (MDI)-grensesnittet vinduet Oversikt over.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> must be specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MdiWindowListItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>må være angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MdiWindowListItem%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MdiWindowListItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> appears on a MDI window list; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> vises på en MDI vinduet liste; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckedChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.CheckedChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnCheckedChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnCheckedChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> is attached to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"></xref> or whether it can float between the two.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"> </xref> eller den kan flyte mellom to.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Never" name="Never" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Never" name="Never" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Behandler en nøkkel for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, which represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, referert som representerer vinduet meldingen for å behandle.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier som representerer nøkkelen til å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tegnet ble behandlet av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Behandler etikettens tegn.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet som brukes til å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tegnet ble behandlet som en mnemonisk av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir størrelsen og plasseringen av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer størrelsen og plasseringen av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut key text.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir snarveien key teksten.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get or set the text that is displayed as the shortcut key.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å hente eller angi tekst som vises som hurtigtasten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the shortcut key.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som representerer hurtigtasten.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut keys associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hurtigtaster som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShortcutKeys property to assign a key combination to a menu command, such as CTRL+C for the **Copy** command.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen ShortcutKeys skal tilordnes en kommandoen, for eksempel CTRL + C for en kombinasjonen av **kopi** kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: You can use shortcut keys instead of or in addition to access keys, which are underscored letters in menus or menu items used with the ALT key.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke hurtigtaster i stedet for eller i tillegg til Microsoft access, som underscored bokstaver i menyer eller menyelementer som brukes med ALT nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Define access keys in code by typing an ampersand (&) before the letter you want to use for an access key.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurere tilgang til nøklene i koden ved å skrive inn et &-tegn (&) før bokstaven du vil bruke for hurtigtast.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The property was not set to one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ble ikke satt til en av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the shortcut keys that are associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> are displayed next to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den hurtigtaster som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> vises ved siden av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the shortcut keys are shown; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis hurtigtaster vises; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
